ca.forklabs.javaxpcom.util
Class XPCOMConverter

java.lang.Object
  ca.forklabs.javaxpcom.util.XPCOMConverter

public class XPCOMConverter
extends Object

Class XPCOMConverter is a rudimentary set of methods to convert from nsIDOMNodes to specialized nodes.

Version:
$Revision$
Author:
Daniel LÃ©onard

Method Detail

asPlainText

public static String asPlainText(org.mozilla.interfaces.nsIDOMNode node)
Extract the plain text of this node and all its children. Not to be confused with asTextNode(nsIDOMNode).

Parameters:
node - the node from which to extract the text.
Returns:
the inner plain text.
See Also:
asTextNode(nsIDOMNode)

asHTMLElement

public static org.mozilla.interfaces.nsIDOMHTMLElement asHTMLElement(org.mozilla.interfaces.nsIDOMNode node)
Query the nsIDOMHTMLElement interface from the node.

Parameters:
node - the node to convert.
Throws:
org.mozilla.xpcom.XPCOMException - if the node is not an anchor.

asTextNode

public static org.mozilla.interfaces.nsIDOMText asTextNode(org.mozilla.interfaces.nsIDOMNode node)
Query the nsIDOMText interface from the node. Extracting the plain inner text of a node should be done with asPlainText(nsIDOMNode).

Parameters:
node - the node to convert.
Throws:
org.mozilla.xpcom.XPCOMException - if the node is not a text node.
See Also:
asPlainText(nsIDOMNode)
